title: Security and Compliance Center docs
introduction: With IBM Cloud Security and Compliance Center, you can embed security checks into your every day workflows to help monitor for security and compliance.

section_recommended.title: How does Security and Compliance Center work?
section_recommended.description: Learn more about the key terms and concepts you need to understand to work with the service.

section_recommended.title: Defining custom rules
section_recommended.description: A rule is used to define the guardrails for how resources can be configured in your account.

section_recommended.title: Viewing results
section_recommended.description: Learn about how to view your results.

tiles.title: Reminder: Security and Compliance Center will be regional
tiles.description: Starting 9 July 2023 Security and Compliance Center will be a provisionable, regional service offering in the IBM Cloud catalog. See the release notes to learn more about what this means for you.

tiles.title: Schedule the frequency of your scans
tiles.description: You can now schedule the frequency of your scans.

tiles.title: Support for context-based restrictions
tiles.description: Context-based restrictions can now be used to manage user and service access to Security and Compliance Center.
